page.title: 17A Lundy childhood remembered
page.content: Idyllic,blissful,carefree;this was the life of a child on Lundy in private ownership days,as described by a resident whose family has been connected with Lundy for sixty two years. "Goatey" her pet goat was her sole companion as for most of her girlhood she was the only child on the island. She was left to her own devices for much of the time,so of necessity a deep respect for the cliffs and sea were instilled in her from an early age.She would wander freely through the fields and while away hours in the quarries where she would imagine fairy folk flitting past the towering granite.Adult residents spoit her. There was always time to spare for a child in this timeless society.She was allowed to ride on one of the four huge working cart horses. {(Continued)
